meanings.sent1: The shriekier cat scared the birds away.
meanings.sent2: Her voice became shriekier as she got more excited.
meanings.sent3: The shriekier alarm clock made waking up a jolting experience.
meanings.sent4: The shriekier whistle pierced through the noisy crowd.
meanings.sent5: The shriekier scream echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.definition: More high-pitched and loud in sound than something else
meanings.sent1: The shriekier song stood out among the others.
meanings.sent2: His laughter grew shriekier as the joke got funnier.
meanings.sent3: The shriekier car horn startled the pedestrians.
meanings.sent4: The shriekier wind howled through the night.
meanings.sent5: The shriekier voice in the choir added a unique tone.
